body:
**Early draft** 

Require us to drop Python 2.6. At the moment you can see what the PR is doing by creating a virtual environment, installing `tqdm` in it, activate the environment and:
```console
$ spack clean -mp
$ spack spec zlib
```
this will trigger the computation of repository indexes and show the progress bars.

Modifications:
- [x] Add a progress bar for cache computation
- [ ] Add a progress bar for software being installed
- [ ] Add a progress bar for software being fetched
- [ ] Add a progress bar for module files being regenerated
- [ ] Add a progress bar for concretization (phases, and specs in environments)
- [ ] Vendor `tqdm` with Spack
title: Add progress bars to Spack
